mutants.code:
import re

def string_formatter(input_string):
    input_string = re.sub('', '', input_string.lower())
    words = input_string.split()
    unique_words = sorted(set(words))
    return unique_words

import re

def string_formatter(input_string):
    input_string = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', input_string.lower())
    words = input_string.split()
    unique_words = sorted(set(words))
    return unique_words
